title: Secure Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and role-based access controls for the portal.
description: Develop a robust authentication mechanism that includes multi-factor authentication (MFA), secure password policies, and encryption for protecting user credentials. Introduce role-based access control (RBAC) to limit user access to services based on authorization levels, ensuring data confidentiality and compliance with banking security standards.

title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
summary: Design and build a personalized dashboard displaying products and services based on customer profile and eligibility.
description: Create an intuitive dashboard that provides customers with an overview of their financial products, account summaries, and personalized service offerings. The dashboard should use profile-based configuration to show relevant actions, quick links, and updates, allowing customers to access important banking information in real time.

title: Responsive Multi-Device Interface
summary: Develop a responsive, accessible interface to ensure a consistent user experience across all devices.
description: Implement a mobile-first responsive design that adapts seamlessly to various screen sizes, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Ensure that the interface maintains consistent usability, accessibility, and performance standards across devices, allowing customers to easily navigate and interact with the portal from any platform.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Enable users to open new accounts and submit service modifications through streamlined, digital workflows.
description: Build flexible, intuitive workflows that allow customers to initiate and complete account opening and service modification requests online. Incorporate automated form completion, data validation, and backend integration to minimize manual input and improve processing efficiency, eliminating the need for physical branch visits.

title: Document Upload and Application Draft Management
summary: Allow users to securely upload documents and save unfinished applications for later completion.
description: Implement a document management capability enabling customers to upload necessary files directly through the portal using secure encryption methods. Introduce a draft-saving feature that automatically stores incomplete applications, allowing users to resume and complete them later without data loss.

title: Notifications and Real-Time Status Updates
summary: Provide real-time tracking and notifications via email and in-portal alerts for submitted requests.
description: Develop a notification and tracking system that displays live status updates for submitted account or service requests. Enable customers to receive automated email updates and in-platform messages for status changes, approvals, or required actions, enhancing transparency and satisfaction.

title: Interaction History and Audit Logging
summary: Maintain detailed logs of all customer interactions to provide visibility and ensure compliance.
description: Create a secure history and audit module that records every customer interaction, service request, and portal activity. Make this information accessible via a user-facing activity history and an administrator-viewable audit trail, ensuring traceability, transparency, and compliance with financial regulations.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the existing core banking system for real-time data synchronization.
description: Develop secure APIs and middleware to enable seamless communication between the portal and the institution's core banking system. Ensure real-time data synchronization for account updates, requests, and eligibility checks to provide accurate, up-to-date information to customers without introducing latency.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Implement a dedicated, high-performance database to manage portal operations independently.
description: Set up a standalone database structure optimized for scalability and performance, separate from the core banking system. Incorporate indexing, caching, and backup strategies to ensure high-speed data retrieval, failover support, and smooth performance even under heavy user traffic.

title: Data Security, Compliance, and Encryption Framework
summary: Ensure full data security and compliance through advanced encryption and protection mechanisms.
description: Enforce industry-grade encryption for data at rest and in transit, along with secure storage protocols for sensitive information. Conduct regular vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and compliance audits with banking security standards such as PCI-DSS and GDPR to maintain a secure, compliant digital environment.
